name: authentik
description: Authentik is a self-hosted identity provider and access management platform that supports OAuth 2.0, SAML, and LDAP. It targets enterprises and self-hosters looking for a keycloak alternative with modern UI.
features: Identity Provider: Complete authentication and access management. Enterprise-grade security.
OAuth 2.0 & SAML: Support for modern authentication protocols. Standard compliance.
LDAP Integration: Connect to existing directory infrastructure. Seamless migration.
Modern UI: Beautiful, intuitive administration interface. Easy management.
Keycloak Alternative: Powerful alternative with better UX. Modern approach.
Flow-Based: Visual workflow designer for auth flows. Flexible configuration.
Multi-Tenancy: Support multiple organizations from one instance. Scalable architecture.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over identity management. Data sovereignty.
